component.name: qsfp_clk
component.description: 156.25MHz clock from LVDS oscillator for QSFP interface [OSC7]

component.name: sata_clk
component.description: 156.25MHz clock from LVDS oscillator for SATA interface [OSC7]

component.name: i2c_addr
component.description: I2C address for FMC EEPROM memory

component.name: i2c_bus
component.description: I2C interface for FMC EEPROM memory
